SEARCH
Package oogasalad.fileparser

Class SpriteDataParser

java.lang.Object
oogasalad.fileparser.SpriteDataParser
public class SpriteDataParser extends Object
Parses XML sprite files into structured SpriteData records containing base frame data, frame sequences, and animation sequences.

This parser reads sprite data using information provided via a SpriteRequest, locates the appropriate XML file based on configured file paths, and extracts relevant sprite information including base images, frame lists, and animation timelines.

File paths are configured via a fileStructure.properties file that specifies the locations of sprite and graphics data directories.

This class is typically used as part of the level loading or game asset initialization process.

Author:
Billy McCune

  • Constructor Details

    • SpriteDataParser

      public SpriteDataParser() throws SpriteParseException
      Constructs a new SpriteDataParser by reading the properties file and loading the graphics and game data file paths.
      Throws:
      SpriteParseException - if an error occurs while loading the properties file or required properties are missing.

  • Method Details

    • loadDataPaths

      private Map<String,String> loadDataPaths() throws SpriteParseException
      Loads required data paths from the properties file into a map.
      Returns:
      a map containing the keys "graphicsDataPath" and "spriteDataPath" mapped to their corresponding values.
      Throws:
      SpriteParseException - if the properties file is not found, or required properties are missing.

    • getRequiredProperty

      private String getRequiredProperty(Map<String,String> properties, String key) throws SpriteParseException
      Retrieves a required property from the specified properties map and ensures it is present and non-empty.
      Parameters:
      properties - the map containing properties loaded from the file.
      key - the key whose corresponding property value is required.
      Returns:
      the non-null, trimmed property value associated with the given key.
      Throws:
      SpriteParseException - if the property for the given key is missing or its value is empty.

    • getSpriteData

      public SpriteData getSpriteData(SpriteRequest request) throws SpriteParseException
      Retrieves a SpriteData record from an XML sprite file.

      Builds the file path for the sprite XML file, loads and parses the document, and extracts the sprite, frame, and animation information from it.

      Parameters:
      request - a SpriteRequest object containing all required sprite parameters.
      Returns:
      a SpriteData object representing the parsed sprite data.
      Throws:
      SpriteParseException - if an error occurs during parsing or if the specified sprite is not found.

    • buildFilePath

      private String buildFilePath(String gameName, String group, String type, String spriteFile)
      Builds the file path to the sprite XML file.
      Parameters:
      gameName - the game name.
      group - the group folder name.
      type - the type folder name.
      spriteFile - the sprite file name.
      Returns:
      the full file path as a String.

    • loadDocument

      private Document loadDocument(String filePath) throws SpriteParseException
      Loads an XML Document from the given file path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the XML file.
      Returns:
      the loaded Document.
      Throws:
      SpriteParseException - if an error occurs while loading the document.

    • getSpriteSheetFile

      private File getSpriteSheetFile(Element spriteFileElement, String gameName)
      Retrieves the sprite sheet file from the spriteFile element's imagePath attribute.
      Parameters:
      spriteFileElement - the root element of the sprite file.
      gameName - the name of the game.
      Returns:
      the sprite sheet File object.

    • getTargetSprite

      private Element getTargetSprite(Element spriteFileElement, String spriteName)
      Searches for and returns the <sprite> element with the given spriteName.
      Parameters:
      spriteFileElement - the root element of the sprite file.
      spriteName - the name of the sprite.
      Returns:
      the matching sprite element, or null if not found.

    • parseBaseImage

      private FrameData parseBaseImage(Element targetSprite, String spriteName)
      Parses the base frame data (base image) from the target sprite element.
      Parameters:
      targetSprite - the sprite element representing the target sprite.
      spriteName - the name of the sprite.
      Returns:
      a FrameData record for the base image.

    • parseFrames

      private List<FrameData> parseFrames(Element targetSprite)
      Parses all frame elements within the <frames>element.
      Parameters:
      targetSprite - the sprite element containing the frames.
      Returns:
      a list of FrameData records.

    • parseFrameData

      private FrameData parseFrameData(Element frameElement)
      Parses a <frames> element and returns a FrameData record.
      Parameters:
      frameElement - the frame element from the XML.
      Returns:
      a FrameData record containing the frame's attributes.

    • parseAnimations
